fields.summary: iOS7: Progress Bar - the progress bar mesage is invisible in  toolbar and navbar due to the wrong color

fields.description:
Test steps:
1. Install and run KS> Controls> Progress Bar
2. Click Start Progress

Actual result:

fields.summary: iOS7: Progress Bar - bad file descriptor error in the console

comments.body:
Not sure if we fixed this or was part another bug.

Cannot Reproduce anymore.
Tested on Ipad 4 running iOS 7 Beta 6 , Xcode 5 DP 5 using C.I master build on 23rd August.

Tested and verified fixed with:
Mac osx 10.8.4 Mountain Lion
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.3.201308252005
Titanium SDK, build:3.1.3.v20130828104626
alloy:1.2.1
CLI:3.1.2
Xcode5-DP6
KS 3_1_X branch
Devices:
Ipad4 iOS 7 beta6(11A4449d)
iPnone5 iOS 7 beta6
